Orem.Superintendent's Residence at the Utah S:
The Superintendent's Residence at the Utah State Hospital is a historic house located in at the Utah State Hospital, Provo, Utah, USA. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1986.
This colonial revival style home was built in 1934. It is one of 232 structures built in Utah during the 1930s under the WPA and various New Deal Programs.
